Player History
Drafted in 24th round, 375th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit on 5/1/2015, off Jeremy Fletcher (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/28/2015, off Christopher Engstrom (NY)...
10/5/2015: Signed a contract extension with Brooklyn, $5,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 5/1/2016 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/23/2016 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 5/9/2017...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York on 8/25/2017...
Injured on 9/3/2017 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/25/2018 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
8/14/2018: Signed a contract extension with Brooklyn, $1,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2018...
Traded from Brooklyn to St. Louis (B) on 6/10/2019 (Going to BRO: 1B Christopher Gantz. Going to SLB: 2B Glenn Sweeten)...
